alert.note: Alert for Shackelford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 9:53PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SHACKELFORD COUNTY THROUGH 1045 PM CDT... At 953 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mccarty Lake, or 7 miles west of Albany, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Albany, Ibex, Mccarty Lake, and Us-180 Near The Shackelford- Stephens County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
